mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review_reply(rr_no, r_no, rr_content, id) values (review_reply_seq.nextval, #{r_no}, #{rr_content},#{id})
mapper.update: update tbl_review_reply set rr_content = #{rr_content}, rr_updatetime = sysdate where rr_no =#{rr_no}
mapper.select: select count(rr_no) from tbl_review_reply where r_no = #{r_no}
